name: AtomHex
summary:
aka "That crazy multiplier game" or "the thinking man's Geometry Wars"

AtomHex is a colourful, fast-paced shooter where you pilot your ship through a world filled with Atoms, Hexes and their enemy offspring.
• Collect Powerups to enhance your fire power
• Change your shot colour by picking up coloured Hexes
• Chain Multipliers to attain outrageous scores
• And survive until 6 Atoms join a Hex to go Subatomic!

Can you score over 1 billion in less than 5 minutes?
